snippet: This collection of stories provides counsel on buying things that go beyond everyday shopping —from a horse to political change to a longer life.
abstract: Introduction to Your Money special section, which includes articles on how to save money on variety of purchases.
lead_paragraph: This collection of stories provides counsel on buying things that go beyond everyday shopping —from a horse to political change to a longer life.

headline.main: A Guide to Buying Just About Anything
headline.print_headline: A Guide to Buying Just About Anything
